warium_additions.ponder.breeder_reactor_: Breeder Reactor Interface is used to input items in the breeder reactor
Breeder reactor consists of 4 main parts
Chamber part consists of 3 blocks too
warium_additions.ponder.drive_shaft.head: Large Engine Drive Shaft
warium_additions.ponder.drive_shaft.text: Large Engine Drive Shaft is used to build Large Engine
And each section must be connected to separate Fuel Tank Connection Port
Fuel Tank Connection Port is needed to provide the fuel
Right click with Diesel Bucket to fill Fuel Tank with diesel
Use Fuel Hose to connect Fuel Tank to the engine
Redstone signal should be used to turn the engine on
One Large Engine section produces the same amount of rotation force as Medium Diesel Engine
Up to 8 sections can be stacked to to increase the power
Each section requires redstone signal individually
warium_additions.ponder.empty_missile_ha: Medium Rocket Hardpoint is used for mounting and launching medium-sized rockets and missiles
Redstone signal is needed launch the missile

And each section must be connected to separate Fuel Tank Connection Port

warium_additions.ponder.mortar.text_1: Right-click with Weapon Aimer in second hand to attach it
warium_additions.ponder.mortar.text_10: Higher pitch shot is more accurate, but projectile takes longer to reach the end point
warium_additions.ponder.mortar.text_2: LEFT/RIGHT arrow for yaw UP/DOWN arrow for pitch
warium_additions.ponder.mortar.text_3: Pitch is responsible for the vertical angle of the projectile shot and therefore the coverage distance
warium_additions.ponder.mortar.text_4: While yaw is responsible for the left/right rotation
warium_additions.ponder.mortar.text_8: Conclusion: 0 pitch has the longest range. Both above and below 0 pitch decreases the distance
warium_additions.ponder.mortar.text_9: Lower pitch results in a less accurate shot, but projectile reaches the final destination faster
warium_additions.ponder.power_reactor_in: Power Reactor Interface is used to build power reactor
Power reactor consists of 4 main parts
Chamber part consists of 3 blocks too
